LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPowerLv1.label: Focused Spirit Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPowerLv1.description: Focused Seishin (Spirit/Heart/Mind/Soul) Tip 1: To obtain the permanent buff at Level 3 and 4 of of this skill, dietary restrictions are required.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPowerLv2.label: Focused Spirit Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPowerLv2.description: Focused Seishin (Spirit/Heart/Mind/Soul) Tip 2: Various-mostly physical-buffs can be acquired.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPower.label: Focused Spirit
LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPower.description: Focused Seishin (Spirit/Heart/Mind/Soul): I eat with gratitude for all the ingredients in the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
